## ValidationOptions.ajvKeywords property

Enable additional AJV keywords from https://github.com/epoberezkin/ajv-keywords - `string[]`<!-- -->: Add an array of keywords from `ajv-keywords`

**Signature:**

```typescript
ajvKeywords?: string[];
```
